intro: I'm a self-taught full-stack developer (with almost 2-3 years of experience) based in Bihar, India. I'm well versed in Javascript based technologies, and have worked with other languages as well in different areas (i.e., frontend, backend, dev-ops etc.)

Solving problems and riding bikes are kind of my thin-g, it is very exciting to me when I come across a new challenge and the more difficult or unsolvable the problem seems, the more interested I get in solving it. With this perspective I have been taking on different kind of tasks, delivering output and gaining experience.
fun_facts: I like winter more than summer
I often do road trips on bike.
I have explored 900+ cities in India
I'm working on myself to be more athletic
The character I like the most would be "Itachi Uchiha"
My favorite song is "Tera Hone Laga Hu" - by Atif Aslam

contact_me.pitch: I'm interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don't hesitate to contact me
